channel.title: How do u make a tele able to click?
channel.description: im useing oemgeescape and i want to be abole to tele when i click the tele button say to varrok how do i change it where i can tele when i click it??i know i have to go to clickingmost.java what next?

item.title: How do u make a tele able to click?
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:366239”]For the 500th time today, please be more clear. I cannot read your mind when it comes to weaver your server is 317, 508 etc…Assuming this is a 317 and that I’m understanding you correctly. You search for your current coords that it leads you to once you teleport in clicking Most.java and then change it too the new ones.

I have a feeling I’ve miss interpreted what you want so if you’re going to post do so in detail.[/quote]
Translated in English:

Hello the MoparScape community!   I need a bit of help...  I'm using the Oemgeescape base, and I want to make the teleport interfaces clickable from the clickingMost.java - which in this case is a file that holds the action variables for my clicking methods.  To start off simple, could someone help me get this going for the Varrock teleport button?

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make a tele able to click?

item.title: How do u make a tele able to click?
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

mickster1997:

im useing oemgeescape and i want to be abole to tele when i click the tele button say to varrok how do i change it where i can tele when i click it??i know i have to go to clickingmost.java what next?

First Go To “ClickingMost.java” Then Go On Your Server And Click On That TelePort That You Want To Change… When It Teleports You Type “::mypos OR ::cords” Then Go Back To “ClickingMost.java” And Search For Those Cords
EXAMPLE:
3320, 8958

search for that… if you can’t find it just search for the first one… after you found the correct cords just change them to the “X” and “Y” Cords You Want… and there you go man… IF YOU STILL DON’T GET IT GET ON TEAMVIEWER… And Ill Give Further assistance…

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make a tele able to click?

item.title: How do u make a tele able to click?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

For the 500th time today, please be more clear. I cannot read your mind when it comes to whether your server is 317, 508 etc…Assuming this is a 317 and that I’m understanding you correctly. You search for your current coords that it leads you to once you teleport in clickingMost.java and then change it too the new ones.

I have a feeling I’ve miss interpreted what you want so if you’re going to post do so in detail.

Read full topic
item.source: How do u make a tele able to click?
